reviewText: This video was very helpful and moved at a great pace.  I have tried other Yoga DVD's, I wish I had found this one first. Overall, this is an extremely well-done DVD

This DVD has made me love yoga! Bai's passion and sincerity, along with her clear instructions, makes yoga interesting and unintimidating, unlike many yoga classes, videos, and DVDs.
She should have her own television show!
